Package shaharas

Class VariableEXPTest

java.lang.Object
shaharas.VariableEXPTest
class VariableEXPTest extends Object
The VariableEXPTest class is designed to test the functionality of the VariableEXP class. This class contains tests for various methods of VariableEXP, including the constructor, setter and getter methods, handling of different input values (including edge cases), and validation of input values.

  • Constructor Details

    • VariableEXPTest

      VariableEXPTest()

  • Method Details

    • testConstructor

      @Test void testConstructor()
      Test case to verify the correct initialization of a VariableEXP object. It checks that the constructor correctly assigns the name and value.

    • testSetValue

      @Test void testSetValue()
      Test case to verify that the setValue method correctly updates the value of the variable.

    • testGetName

      @Test void testGetName()
      Test case to verify the correct retrieval of the variable name.

    • testVariableCreation

      @Test public void testVariableCreation()
      Test case to verify the creation of a VariableEXP object using a StringBuilder for the name. The default value should be 0 when initialized with a StringBuilder.

    • testSet2Value

      @Test public void testSet2Value()
      Test case to verify setting a value for a VariableEXP object initialized with a StringBuilder.

    • testGet2Name

      @Test public void testGet2Name()
      Test case to verify the correct retrieval of the variable name when initialized with a String.

    • testSetValueNegative

      @Test void testSetValueNegative()
      Test case to verify that a negative value can be set correctly.

    • testSetValueZero

      @Test void testSetValueZero()
      Test case to verify that the value can be set to zero correctly.

    • testSetValueSameValue

      @Test void testSetValueSameValue()
      Test case to verify that the value remains unchanged if it is set to the same value.

    • testSetLargeValue

      @Test void testSetLargeValue()
      Test case to verify that a large number can be set as the variable's value.

    • testSetEmptyName

      @Test void testSetEmptyName()
      Test case to check the behavior when an empty string is passed as the variable name. It should throw an IllegalArgumentException with the appropriate message.

    • testSetLongName

      @Test void testSetLongName()
      Test case to verify that a long variable name (up to 1000 characters) is handled correctly.

    • testInvalidName

      @Test void testInvalidName()
      Test case to check the behavior when an invalid name (non-alphabetic starting character) is provided. It should throw an IllegalArgumentException with the appropriate message.
